articles.description: The 61-year-old woman, originally from Syracuse, was in more than 20 movies and 40 TV shows including "Lost," “ER,” “Hope & Gloria,” “NYPD Blue” and “Law and Order."
articles.content:
Cape Vincent, N.Y. A drowning this weekend in the St. Lawrence River of a Syracuse native who went on to become a TV and movie actress has been ruled accidental, troopers said Wednesday.
